other_title: New Dominion Tank Police: Unidade Policial (Portuguese)
特捜戦車隊ドミニオン (Japanese)
plot: In the follow up to Shirow's classic anime, Al, Leona and their trusty mini-tank, Bonaparte, continue to fight crime in Newport City, alongside the rest of the Tank Police. But a new threat appears in the form of a series of terrorist attacks, using the latest weapons technology. The Tank Police are outnumbered and outgunned, but Al and Leona set out to discover who or what is behind these attacks. With massive explosions and high-speed chases, Leona often causes more damage than the criminals she pursues.
opening_theme: "Just Toki o Koete" (JUST.時を越えて; "Just Beyond the Time") by Ayako Udagawa
ending_theme: "Just Fallin' Love - Ikutsumo no Setsunai yoru no Naka de" (JUST FALLIN' LOVE~幾つものせつない夜の中で; "Just Fall in Love - In Many of Earnest Nights") by Ayako Udagawa
